channel.title: Mscp might be gone?
channel.description:
[quote="I james I"]omg, This is my friend writing to jagex, he is trying to get moparscape shutdown look this is what he and jagex said:
[IMG]http://i195.photobucket.com/albums/z82/musicmad441/troubl.jpg[/img]
What is going to happen! omg, I almost killed him lol!
Many Thanks[/quote]
Dont really care but :eek: Jagex got direct attention, I know they cant do anything but.. what [i]could[/i] they do..

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

Lin:

I thought that www, .org, and stuff like that were blocked out on RS, even on bug reports?

I’m not sure if you were talking to me or not :P, but they didnt post any links, they just were posting stuff like “in world 1 there are a lot of people breaking the rules there are to many of them for us to stop” stuff like that, you can ask Silab for her pictures of the rule break day (she posted them awhile ago) and I know she has seen the picture that I posted of the forum, I do have it still (I am looking at it right now) but I’d rather not post it again :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I thought that www, .org, and stuff like that were blocked out on RS, even on bug reports?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2007, 03:03:22 AM[/size][hr][quote=“exe626, post:42, topic:125871”]Actually, according to Jagex’s TOS, you are not to connect to their game using a modified client. In all honesty, we aren’t are we? Where connecting to a different server, not in any way connected to theirs, so we still win.[/quote]Heh not exactly, when Zomg and XHarveyX released their 458 client that connected to RS, a bunch of people used it to connect to RS. But we mostly still win

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

Moparisthebest:

This server is breaking no laws, so it can not be shut down. I have already discussed this with jagex and their lawyers, so don’t worry about it.

yo mopar

is it illegeal for u to post the letters they sent u. curious what they say

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

Thanks, nice to see you guys again :), I guess it was good I was demodded, now I get to see all my friends from this community, and the old players of AARScape get the server back :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“AARisAIR, post:54, topic:125871”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=176155.msg1619122#msg1619122 date=1185066220]
Jagex staff are registered here.
[/quote]

They are defiantly here[/quote]

Remember that guy that registered when we had around 20k members? I reckon he was a jagex staff member.

AARisAIR:

I posted a picture of the pmods freaking out (not showing my account name) I was demodded the next day :P.

Oh that sucks. Would have been better if you wasn’t demodded.

Welcome back, by the way.

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

The Un-Named:

Jagex staff are registered here.

They are defiantly here, I was a pmod on RS for awhile, needless to say, I posted a picture of the mod forum for Silab to see (when she and the others were doing the login and break rules day) I posted a picture of the pmods freaking out (not showing my account name) I was demodded the next day :P.

Read full topic

exe626:

I only say Java, because its everywhere. Its in Firefox, most games are coded in Java, even a shit load of websites are coded in Java. But C would be up there right next to it, if not running in the lead.

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:46, topic:125871”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=176155.msg1620453#msg1620453 date=1185126093]

I see… Well I haven’t seen that TOS in well over 2 years, thanks for clearing that up. I’m yet to see a legal document to tell me that doing what I did to their client is bad.
[/quote]what YOU did…?

Well, they’d probably be pretty mad at me, I’m sure. But what have YOU done that would make them mad? From my experience, 10-20 people out of over 120k people actually know what Java is.[/quote]
They think Java is a drink probably lol

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

TOS:

You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify the Game client software in any way. You must not use a modified/customised version of the client software.

We have decompiled their client, we have modified it, we have used their modified client. I’m not on Jagex’s side, just saying that we do break their TOS.

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Actually, according to Jagex’s TOS, you are not to connect to their game using a modified client. In all honesty, we aren’t are we? Where connecting to a different server, not in any way connected to theirs, so we still win.

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:32, topic:125871”]This server is breaking no laws, so it can not be shut down. I have already discussed this with jagex and their lawyers, so don’t worry about it.[/quote]True, but moparscape does break their tos because they say that all of this is property of Jagex Ltd. and you may not modify it for your own use or something like that, moparscape is made from their files, we modified them, meaning we break their tos.

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Kulkka, post:20, topic:125871”][quote author=I Am Olan14 link=topic=176155.msg1619270#msg1619270 date=1185071007]

Jagex is like powerless.
They may not break the tos or I will hit them with a stick.

Yes, I will too.
Than they will be like “lol wut hax”
[/quote]
Moparscape noobs will summon goblins on them.[/quote]::goblins

[quote=“exe626, post:39, topic:125871”]People on Moparscape aren’t retarded, there not as smart as others, but not retarded. Look up the word retard, you might be surprised. Besides, what gives you the right to call a group of coders(Coding requires the use of the brain, and intelligence) retarded anyways? Explain.[/quote]gg hypocrisy. what shits me off about moparscapers is what they do; literally copy and paste, then call themselves ‘coders’

Read full topic

item.title: Mscp might be gone?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:34, topic:125871”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=176155.msg1620049#msg1620049 date=1185099701]

And, if moparisthebest.com gets shut down and not this one, I’m happy :D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D:D

you think that now… just think of the floods of retarded moparscapers coming over here… lol.

They arn’t retarded, and you’re ignorant for saying that. You’re basicly calling people who are able to type, use a computer, able to read, able to use their brain retarded. Go look it up and don’t call people it again.
[/quote]

They’re mighty’ fine in using control+c + p.[/quote]

Still doesn’t make them “retarded”, seriously, don’t call people it. You’re basicly calling mopar retarded aswell, and a few other people that are really smart.

Read full topic
